Articles.Content: I was just talking in the R/KerbalSpaceProgram Discord and got talking about name decals on crafts. They started listing a bunch that could be done and i got to thinking, Could you place an object that acts like a textbox, You type what you want it to say, hit enter and the object updates to display what was just typed into the textbox.

On 7/5/2020 at 6:50 AM, xD-FireStriker said:

I was just talking in the R/KerbalSpaceProgram Discord and got talking about name decals on crafts. They started listing a bunch that could be done and i got to thinking, Could you place an object that acts like a textbox, You type what you want it to say, hit enter and the object updates to display what was just typed into the textbox. 

Not sure you ever saw Conformal Decals?

I could see this eventually able to do as you describe -- just dropping the craft name right onto the craft. But for the moment you just have to type it in again by hand.
